name: Minesweeper Arcade
description:
Minesweeper is back, with an arcade twist!

Enjoy 50 unique levels, designed to challenge even the smartest players.
Race against the clock in arcade mode, or take your time in casual mode.
Relive the suspense and excitement of old-school minesweeper in classic mode.
Play the standard minesweeper board sizes or create your own custom boards.
Avoid sticky situations using hints to eliminate guesswork.

Earn achievements by beating arcade levels and completing classic minesweeper boards quickly.
Compete against the world's greatest minesweepers by setting high scores on global leaderboards.

Are you ready? Let's play Minesweeper Arcade!
